CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios
CurrentVersion.description: Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios: New detections are being added to Communication Compliance that enables you to build safer online environments by detecting potential hate and violence then assigning severity scores to unsafe text across languages. These classifiers are built using large language models. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect business conduct and regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self Service for bulk uploads
OldVersion.description: Improved self-service; Ability to bulk upload customer permissions for improved access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
CurrentVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
OldVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Image background removal in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: You can remove a background from your image and photos using AI.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Image background removal in Clipchamp
OldVersion.description: You can remove a background from your image and photos using AI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Enhancements to insider risk level settings
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item was updated to 'launched' unintentionally. We apologize for the inconvenience. With this new feature, an admin can choose whether they want to expire the Adaptive Protection insider risk level. Today, this expiration happens automatically, but you can now choose to keep the Adaptive Protection insider risk level for a user, even if their alert is dismissed or case is closed. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Multiple insights and notifications on profile cards
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, users were only able to see one insight or notification on their own or on a colleague's profile card. Now they will be able to see multiple insights through a Show All button.  #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Multiple insights and notifications on profile cards
OldVersion.description: Previously, users were only able to see one insight or notification on their own or on a colleague's profile card. Now they will be able to see multiple insights through a Show All button.  #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Edit questions associated to live surveys
CurrentVersion.description: Allow Glint Admins to edit select fields of a question that is associated to live surveys.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Edit questions associated to live surveys
OldVersion.description: Allow Glint Admins to edit select fields of a question that is associated to live surveys.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Image generation in Copilot chat
CurrentVersion.description: Create images using natural language to visualize concepts and ideas within the flow of work in Copilot for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Immersive Inline Play update
CurrentVersion.description: Current Learning Content details and Player page will be combined to give a more immersive consumption experience for users in Viva Learning. The update will impact all content details pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Whiteboard can be added to Mesh event
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event participants can now use Microsoft Whiteboard in Mesh 3D environments. This functionality will enable users to collaborate spatially as avatars on a 2D whiteboard present in the virtual space, available on PC and Meta Quest devices. Mesh event attendees can use inking, annotation, and other built-in tools to brainstorm, plan, and share with others on a digital canvas in real time. Copilot integration with Whiteboard helps suggest and organize ideas directly on your canvas while in Mesh.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.
